CatDescriptText: Mr. Robert Buckner, 915 Shawnee Street, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 19, 1958, pg. 9 with question: "Do you think that a business recession has hit the United States? If so, how has it affected you?" answer reads: "I don't know.  I can say that I haven't been affected in my job which is that of being a rubbish collector for the city."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Robert Buckner wearing checkered button down collared shirt with breast pockets, eyeglasses, and dark cap, standing in front of brick wall with painted sign advertising meat products
